Description:
DOUBLE BLOCK! POOL AND UNIT! ALL OFFERS CONSIDERED!
Enviable central Drysdale position, loads of space and extra generous proportions here at no. 45. The facade is wrapped by a wide verandah and mature gardens. Enter through the wide ornate front door to a gracious entry hallway and double glass period doors through to the formal lounge room. The spacious kitchen features solid Blackwood timber cabinetry, St George double oven & DW with dining area and second adjacent living room. Three generous bedrooms, BIR'S in main, plus study or fourth bedroom. Central bathroom, shower combined with laundry and separate toilet. The self contained unit has kitchen, bathroom, living and bedroom with access to the rear gardens and separate external access to the front of the property.
Features include period dado, high ceilings, central heating and cooling, space heater, instant gas HWS, as new colorbond roofing, 2 x 30,000lt water tanks and 5 minutes stroll to the centre of Drysdale. The double access allows for 4 vehicles as well as caravan and/or boat space, workshop option. Still plenty of room for the pool with the rambling gardens adding seclusion and privacy. A fantastic central Drysdale property!

Description:
Immaculate Presentation On Large Block
The Feel:
Situated in one of Central Walk's elevated pockets, this 4-bedroom family home presents as new. Immaculately presented, the floorplan provides dual living areas, zoned sleeping quarters & a versatile study. Protected outdoor living capitalises on the west orientation, seamlessly connecting the indoors & outdoors via a corner sliding door system. The large lawn offers bountiful space for play, while parks & wetlands provide a lovely family friendly setting, conveniently located just 800m from the local school & shops.
The Facts:
-Quality custom-built brick veneer residence by local Boutique Homes
-Highly regarded Central Walk estate boasts stunning parklands; new park opposite coming soon
-Spacious well-proportioned open plan living, meals & kitchen with high ceilings
-Inviting wide entry with dark stained oak timber laminate floors throughout & carpet to bedrooms
-Modern kitchen with clean lines, caesarstone waterfall island bench & WIP
-Stainless steel Ilve appliances (900mm oven, 6 burner gas hob), DW & dbl fridge cavity
-Sunny living & meals area connects seamlessly to outdoor area via corner sliding door system
-Covered alfresco area with merbau deck - a great space for entertaining
-Fully fenced yard with large lawn for kids & pets & low maintenance boundary plantings
-Brivis ducted heating throughout, SSAC to main living, & ceiling fans in all bedrooms
-Spacious Master bedroom with commanding north position, TV point & WIR
-Luxury en-suite with double rain shower, twin vanities, stone bench & separate toilet
-Zoned wing to 3 more bedrooms & central bathroom (vanity, deep tub, shower, sep toilet)
-Versatile 2nd living/rumpus/media room with east aspect further endorses family-friendly design
-Dedicated Study buds off hallway, with sunny west aspect
-Elevated corner position with big sky outlook, mature treed surrounds & landscaped garden
-Exposed aggregate driveway to RC DLUG with internal & rear yard access
-3mins drive to cafes & shops, 800m to Drysdale PS, 500m to Rail Trail
The Owner Loves....
We love the palpable sense of space that we have from this raised position on a corner block. Theres nothing better than relaxing on the deck in the afternoon sun, with a huge gum tree across the road provides a beautiful outlook. Soon there will be a brand new playground on the reserve, which the kids will love!

Description:
Stylish New Single Level Townhouse
This home is currently available to inspect by Virtual Tour or by Private Inspections, please contact agent for further information
Overlooking a park and situated on the corner of a quiet street in Drysdale is a brand, spanking new single-level townhouse. Showcasing contemporary flair and charcoal tones throughout, there is a slick feel to this property.
At the front of the residence is the bright and open living and dining hub that flows out to a courtyard. The kitchen boasts stone bench tops, island breakfast bar, Smeg appliances, textured white subway splashback and ample cabinetry.
Along the hallway there is access to a double lock-up garage and generous linen press. Up two steps to a carpeted slumber zone consisting of three queen size bedrooms, two with built-in robes and master with a walk-in and en suite.
The hotel-style bathroom pulses sophistication with a soaker tub, vanity, speckled concrete tiles and shower. Extra touches include a full laundry, separate toilet, water tank servicing toilets, double glazed windows, block-out blinds and refrigerated zoned cooling and heating.
With this kind of location the lucky owners will be walking to the shops, cafes, heart of town and schools. A perfect downsizer, first-home purchase or addition to a property portfolio. Call Richard for an inspection today!
- Brand new stylish and light townhouse in Drysdale
- Three queen size bedrooms, master with an en suite and WIR
- Low maintenance residence close to shops, schools and cafes
- Ideal downsizer, first-home or savvy investment
- Double lock-up garage, refrigerated cooling and heating
- Only five minutes from beaches and 20 minutes drive into Geelong

Description:
Ultimate Lifestyle Opportunity on the Bellarine
The Feel:
Murradoc Lodge is one of the Bellarines most exclusive lifestyle properties, with breathtaking views over rolling hills to Bass Strait. Set on over 11 acres (approx) with black cracking soil, fenced paddocks & equine facilities, vantage points can be enjoyed from various parts of this amazing property across Corio Bay to Geelong, the You Yangs & Queenscliff. Superbly updated with a quintessential country feel, this 4-bed home has multiple living areas, a showpiece Provincial style kitchen, solar-heated pool & covered entertaining area in a sunny, private position.
The Facts:
INDOORS:
-Fully renovated homestead, set on 11 Acres (approx.) 5 mins from Drysdale village
-Commanding hilltop position with unrestricted views of Bass Strait & beyond to the Surf Coast
-Vantage points w/ views to Geelong, You Yangs & Queenscliff
-Family-friendly floorplan provides well-zoned options for children or possible B&B potential
-Traditional character meets Provincial style for a quintessential country feel
-Wide X-Brace verandas wrap the north & west elevations, offering restful, contemplative spaces
-Large formal living space overlooks the north-facing pool & farm boundary
-High ceilings with large picture & bay windows invite resplendent views inside
-Countryside views framed by large timber windows in the OP kitchen, dining & living zones
-Chefs kitchen with Tasmanian Oak cabinetry, Provincial display cabinet, all new light fittings
-Extensive black granite breakfast bar w/ induction cooktop & DW
-Large walk-through Butlers Pantry, 900mm s/s Technika f/s gas cooker
-Velux Skylight floods the home with abundant daylight
-Tranquil master suite includes SSAC, WIR & Bay views through picture windows
-Luxurious en-suite showcases Bass Strait by day & the constellations by night
-You Yangs & Bay views from north-facing queen-size bedroom
-Large laundry with durable stainless-steel benches & powder room
-Commodious eastern bedroom wing is the perfect teenage retreat (excellent B&B potential)
-Queen sized bedrooms open on to covered veranda with spectacular views
-Spacious rumpus/TV room with SSAC affords children/guests their own space
-Central bathroom & WC with Corian vanity, bath & embossed herringbone tiling
-Electric home heating, 4 x SSACs & open fireplace creates a central hub in main living
-Remote DLUG with internal access
OUTDOORS:
-Cypress-lined driveway, accessed by automatic gates, leads to distinctive Murradoc Lodge
-Solar-heated, salt-chlorinated pool & covered entertaining area in sunny, private position
-2 fenced yards & 4 paddocks, as well as huge raised garden beds for a self-sufficient lifestyle
-Large shed with high clearance for toys' & caravans, plus additional utility shed & pergola
-Secure stables at the other end of the shed & 20x50m arena for equine enthusiasts
-Total of 90,000L(approx) rainwater storage for drinking & home use that never runs low
-32,500L shed roof water harvesting for stock, with autofill systems for paddock troughs
-Beautiful Kikuyu lawns + black cracking soil w/ fruiting trees, blue gums, Moreton Bays & Magnolia
-Just 5 minutes to every family convenience in Drysdale, & the Bellarine's best schools
-10 minutes to surf & bay beaches, wineries & the Portarlington ferry to Docklands
This premium location strikes the perfect balance of a peaceful country lifestyle, with all the convenience required for a modern family.
**PLEASE NOTE** This property is accessed via Drakes Road, not Whitcombes Road. The entry to the property is located on the corner of Drakes Road and Founds Road, Drysdale.
The Owner Loves.
This house is big enough to host any occasion, we have had the whole family here for Christmas and celebrations, & entertaining flows easily out to the pool or covered veranda. There are so many places to sit, both inside & out, to take in the glorious views.

Description:
CENTRAL DRYSDALE, WALK EVERYWHERE! NOTHING TO DO.
In the middle of the village with all amenities at your doorstep, medical, shops, parks, library and cafes. This home has so much to offer, generous proportions in all rooms , large lounge room , well designed kitchen with adjacent dining and sliding doors opening to outside alfresco area. Two bedrooms , both with BIR'S, central bathroom, laundry and separate toilet. Features include walk in pantry, split system, gas heater and fan. Matured gardens to delight the new owner, so easy to relax. Single garage with direct access to home and enough room for some storage. Enjoy the life here on the Bellarine with this perfect, affordable downsize, maybe first time buy or investment. Inspect now by appointment or come to the open day.

Description:
Rural property with bay views - best of both worlds
This 'Malishev' homestead property is a lifestyle marvel. With panoramic views across Port Phillip Bay to Mount Martha, sweeping around to Melbourne's pinnacle skyline. The property is well set up for horse lovers with fenced paddocks and stables.
The main open plan domain has direct access to the alfresco deck. Boasting gorgeous north-facing light. This space comprises of the kitchen with breakfast bar; two living areas and dining. The formal lounge is defined by the lowered step-level and open fireplace. The bedrooms are zoned in the southern wing, centred around the third living space.
The palatial master suite is distinctly separated and is adorned with a large WIR and luxury ensuite. The main bathroom has a timber and stone floating vanity and deep freestanding tub. The laundry offers plenty of storage and generous timber-top bench space.
Entertain in the indoor-outdoor room overlooking the saltwater pool. The duties of this boutique farm are well managed with the cattle yards, hayshed, stable & tack rooms, 3-phase power, the dam and 164KL rainwater tanks. The energy needs of the house are convincely met with gas and 20 x solar panels. Brilliantly located on the edge of Drysdale, you are offered seclusion while being a 4-minute drive to the centre of town. At the bottom of the driveway you also have access to the Bus Stop which is a ultra-convenient school pick point.
- Oversized DLUG with workshop.
- Zoned ducted heating/cooling
- Alarm system with motion sensors
- Electric fencing.

Description:
DESIRABLE POSITION , ONE OF THE BEST! 944 SQM IN DRYSDALE.
Presentation is perfect with new carpets, some new window furnishings, painted throughout, all for the astute new owner to enjoy this large home and land. Gracious entrance with light and bright open plan area to the right including timber kitchen, generous dining and living. A second lounge room (could be two rooms) is magnificent........the living is easy with so much room. Three large bedrooms ( all with WIR) , study, central bathroom, laundry and separate toilet. Some features include, high ceilings, leadlight, rosettes, 2 gas heaters, large pantry, some double glazed windows, extra insulation and more. The garden is leafy and private but still allows the natural light to enhance all living areas. Double garage with tandem to rear yard, extra space for further access and small sheds as well. Walk to Drysdale village, schools, medical facilities and all amenities. The beauty of the Bellarine Peninsula is on your doorstep with wineries, fine restaurants and the Portarlington ferry to the city....a real gem.

Description:
Space & Natural Beauty On Acreage With Stunning Outlook
The Feel:
Wideacre is a 4.3acre lifestyle property that presents boundless opportunities for sustainable semi-rural living, with established natives, orchard & vegetable gardens that will bear plentiful harvests for years to come. Beautifully appointed with sweeping natural views from every vantage point, it is flanked by neighbouring picturesque farmland, delivering a palpable sense of serenity & space. Enjoy the views from 270 decks or the comfort of a fireside lounge, all just minutes from schools & amenities.
The Facts:
-One of the Bellarines best kept secrets, tucked away in a secluded location
-Towering Redgums, Eucalypts & Cypress trees beckon your arrival
-Elevated position captures expansive views of verdant lawns & rainbow trout-stocked dam
-All living, meals & kitchen areas are orientated to frame inspiring views
-270 wraparound decks including a semi-enclosed sunroom for all-weather entertaining
-Kitchen features quality s/s apps incl: Bosch wall oven, DW & Westinghouse electric hotplates
-Solitaire Eureka wood fire + ducted heating/evaporative cooling delivers lifestyle appeal
-Second living/ sitting area adjoins the kitchen & flows out to deck
-Wake to garden views from king-size Master bedroom, with en-suite & WIR
-2 more carpeted BRs feature BIRs & stunning garden views
-Central bathroom has shower, spa bath, vanity & separate toilet
-Tiled floors to heavy traffic areas & plush carpet to living & bedrooms
-Fully fenced yard with rabbit proofing; lawn offers space for children & pets to play
-Raised vegie garden beds, abundant orchard (apricot/pear/apple/orange/nectarine)
-9,000L tank w/ pump to vegie garden + 1,600L tank for additional rainwater storage
-30x20m DLUG garage with workshop + large machinery shed, single carport, hothouse & fernery!
-Rustic wine cellar under the house
-A few short minutes by car to schools, bay & coastal towns & easy access to Bypass
The Owner Loves.
Every day, we sit out in the sunroom on the deck & read the paper with a cup of coffee. By the afternoon, the sunsets are glorious & we can see the distant twinkling lights of Geelong beyond the rural outlook. Coming home to Wideacre has always been a great thing.

Central Walk Block

Central Walk Estate is within a short distance to all of Drysdale amenities, including supermarkets, schools, local shopping, array of cafes, medical facilities and public transport.

Description:
The Ultimate lifestyle property on the edge of town.
Set on a sprawling 3.3 acres this lovely country property has everything you will need to enjoy a country lifestyle in this beautiful part of the Bellarine. The home itself features 4 bedroom, Study, 2 living 3 bathrooms, laundry, mud room and large rumpus. The property has established gardens including numerous fruit trees and vegie boxes. Double shed with power and water tank, chook sheds, horse shelters and fenced off paddocks. Ideally located it is only moments away from Drysdale town centre, Wineries, 7 minutes to Portarlington and the Clifton Springs boat ramp and only 25 minutes to the Geelong CBD. The home features a stunning large open plan kitchen, dining and lounge. The renovated the kitchen is a stylish combination of stone and solid timber benchtops and includes a free standing SS Gas cooktop and oven and dishwasher. This really is the hub of the home and enjoys views of the property. Climate control is achieved using 2 split system air conditioners, 2 Coonara style wood heaters and ceiling fans. The master bathroom is off the main entrance and features an ensuite and walk in robe. In addition 2 more bedrooms, the partially renovated central bathroom and laundry are located towards the middle of the home. Beyond this is a large rumpus room and generous study/5th bedroom. Towards the rear of the home is the 4th bedroom, another lounge with bar/2nd kitchen including built in keg tap and servery window connecting to the massive outdoor area (8x12metre) which boasts exposed aggregate with built barbeque and spa. From here you will enjoy sweeping views of the landscape and enjoy a country property atmosphere right on the edge of the town! Flexible floorplan with room to improve or simply move in. Proximity to shops, Portarlington Marina, boat ramps, wineries and the Geelong CBD make this a truly desirable property and rare opportunity.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Lovingly Renovated Classic Brick Home
The Feel:
This classic brick home has been lovingly renovated, bringing it into modernity with contemporary features for todays lifestyle requirements. The original façade meets new surfaces including Bluestone & porcelain tiles, Merbau & Spotted Gum decks & durable bamboo floors throughout. The spacious yard is ideal for a down-sizer, or perfect for a young family as the house lends itself to extension into the expansive backyard (STCA). 2 large bedrooms, plus a versatile 3rd BR/Study, complement the north-facing home with verdant outlooks & Bay glimpses.
The Facts:
-Quality home with generously proportionated backyard & room for extension in big yard (STCA)
-First impressions of neat brick veneer exterior finish with well-kept gardens & refreshed entrance
-Cosy lounge room offers relaxed living with SSAC & views of garden & deck
-Gas log fire set in Redgum mantlepiece w/ Caesarstone hearth & porcelain tile surround
-Durable bamboo floors & double roller blinds throughout
-Perfectly maintained, with roof tiles recently cleaned/de-mossed/repaired
-Well-equipped kitchen w/ SSAC features quality cabinetry & Westinghouse/Smeg appliances including dishwasher
-Meals area flows seamlessly to Spotted Gum deck, encompassing rural views & Bay glimpses
-Glass balustrade w/ marine grade steel rails add contemporary appeal
-BBQ plumbed to gas & RC awning to north deck, plus UV awnings to all other windows
-2 spacious bedrooms with BIRs & RC ceiling fans (Master with SSAC) + versatile 3rd BR/Study
-Central bathroom with shower, bath & toilet, heated towel rail & Tastic heater
-5.3Kw solar panels, double glazed & tinted windows to most + Crimsafe security doors
-All new boundary fences, fully secure for kids & pets
-Merbau deck under dappled light of huge elm & productive fig tree amongst native gardens
-Fantastic location; close to all facilities & easy access to the best of the Bellarine
-Ample OSP with large carport, SLUG with workshop area, & garden shed at rear
The Owner Loves
With views across the rolling hills & glimpses of the Bay, & surrounded by neighbouring trees & gardens that complement our own much-loved gardens, we love the sense of privacy yet space we get from our deck...

Bellarine Property will not be liable for any loss resulting from any action or decision by you in reliance on the information.

Description:
PROMINENT LARGE BLOCK, CHOOSE YOUR ADVENTURE
"State Government now permitting public OFI's for groups of 10 people, social distancing still applies"
In this current climate you may be looking for a project to keep you busy while you are in isolation or choosing to work remotely. A project that has your mind focused on something new and innovative. An escapism from the current world situation.
Firstly we will be offering staggered private inspections Saturday May 9th between 12.00pm and 12.30pm. So if you have an interest in this home be quick to call to lock in your time. So if you have an interest in this home be quick to call to lock in your time. Please be advised that inspections on this home are still permissible with the new updated Covid19 Stage 3 regulations
Just to market is a large block (920m2 approx) with an older house on it in the main street of Drysdale. The potential is available for subdivision (STCA) or if you like working with your hands and watch as you transform something old to new again you may choose the option of restoring this home from the ground up.
The prospective purchaser may like to consider renting the home out while working on a subdivision project. With a Residential Growth Zone the City of Greater Geelong will be able to assist with guidelines for development.
The historic town of Drysdale operates in the 21st century with all the necessary amenities to work live and play. With the new Childrenâs Centre over the road doors may open up for Child based support such as Speech Therapy, Parenting Support Network, Playgroup, Occasional Care etc. A few more ideas for you to consider on this site.
Private inspection welcome and encouraged under Stage 3 Covid-19 restrictions.

Description:
ATTENTION TO DETAIL HERE AT NO. 12 AND F.H.O.G $20,000
Brilliant design by G.J. Gardner in this award winning area, a real surprise when inspecting. The plan takes advantage of the natural light and provides a generous living situation. The open plan area has a well designed kitchen, dining and living, all overlooking and opening to the outdoor entertainment area. The second lounge room provides that flexible space , read , listen to music.....just good to have the option. Four bedrooms, the master with ensuite (double shower) and WIR, all with BIR'S , central bathroom, laundry and toilet. Features include central heating, split system, walk in pantry, wide stone benches, 900 mm stove, S.S. appliances, good storage , quality fittings and more. Double garage with internal access and landscaped matured gardens complete the picture. This 2016 built home is eligible for $20,000 bonus for first time buyers , absolute bliss for the downsizer as well, Situated in this award winning developement and within walking distance of the village and all amenities. Ring me for an inspection.

Description:
AN IMPRESSIVE HENLEY HOME, RAIL TRAIL POSITION.ON APP. 703 SQM......OUTSTANDING!
As new, so well maintained , having plenty of space for the family , yet stylish and nothing to do but create your own haven. A spacious entrance/hallway through to open plan living which includes well designed kitchen and generous dining as well, timber doors open to the undercover entertaining area. Second living room is adjacent while the third is currently used as library/study ....make it what you wish. Four bedrooms are all extra generous, three with BIR'S, the master has WIR and large ensuite. Central bathroom, laundry and separate toilet . Features include central heating, split system, granite bench, high ceilings, glass splashback and quality fittings. Double garage, double rear garage /workshop as well as cemented side drive to hold caravan and /or boat, could do six if needed. An absolute gem in a top spot for access to leisure, schools and all town amenities.

Description:
"A RARE FIND INDEED"
Please contact John directly on 0412 745 029 to arrange a private inspection.
The heading says it all. This property could suit the downsizer, first home buyer, tradie or developer.
Nestled on a 674m2 ALLOTMENT, in a quiet court and ZONED RESIDENTIAL GROWTH.
This charming brick veneer residence is surrounded by delightful established gardens and features three generous bedrooms, two with BIRs and master bedroom includes WIR plus ensuite. Entry leads to formal lounge with SS air conditioning. Spacious family room has gas heating and opens to extensive, paved outdoor entertainment area. Laminate kitchen includes gas cooking, pantry and ample cupboard and bench space. Separate bathroom and laundry.
The beauty of this property that it is in a quiet court location only a few minutes walk to the Drysdale Shopping Centre and very handy to schools, bowls club, golf course, public transport, boat ramps and all the benefits that the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer. The Residential Growth Zoning could be enticing to the developer.
Indeed, a rare find in a truly excellent location.
Due to restrictions imposed as a result of the Corona Virus, this property can only be inspected by private appointment. Please ring John on 0412 745 029 to make your appointment.

Description:
TOP SPOT! 826 SQM LAND! AROUND THE CORNER TO SHOPS & ALL AMENITIES!
Wow what a position, stroll for your paper, groceries, library, doctor, school, all shops and parklands for leisure or enjoy market day. No. 5 has been renovated with only the kitchen to complete, just boxing really and some paintwork. Long verandah with entrance to spacious lounge and adjacent dining room, new kitchen with another area for that smaller second living space. Four bedrooms, three with BIR'S, central bathroom and laundry. Features Rinnai space heater, electric heater, split system, new 900m upright stove, dishwasher, fans, pantry , external blinds, new carpets and floorboards. Freestanding garage and plenty of room for boat, caravan, another vehicle, even add a bungalow for extended family STCA. All done just move in and add your touch to make no. 5 Diana your home, that is all it will take. The living will be easy here in the heart of Drysdale with the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula to enjoy.

Address: 12B- Lot 12 De Burgh Road Drysdale VIC 3222
Description:
Location- In every Aspect!
Titled land on the Bellarine Peninsula is certainly a hard find these days. This lovely parcel of land is situated within close proximity to shopping, schools and the Bellarine Rail Trail. Beaches, wineries, golf, fishing and all the Bellarine peninsula offers are just a short drive away. Drysdale is approximately 20 minutes to central Geelong and an easy commute to Melbourne. Be quick to stake your claim on this very desirable 424m2 (23m frontage) allotment as it won't remain available for long!

Description:
Spacious Townhouse in Central Drysdale
Situated on 364m2 in a manicured garden setting. The biggest one on the block inspection is a necessity to appreciate the interior proportions of this established townhouse in the centre of Drysdale. More like a small house than a unit there are features galore with two spacious bedrooms incorporating floor to ceiling wardrobes. The bathroom has oversized shower, bath and toilet - large enough to accommodate wheelchair access. The open plan living - dining kitchen is light, open and large enough to accommodate any family gathering.
Storage galore in the walk-in pantry, floor to ceiling linen press and laundry cupboards. Extra garage space with remote access and bonus second toilet.
Features split system, ceiling fan, dishwasher, second toilet, 1.5 garage, side access carport, front awning and solar panels. Room for vegies in the back yard and a garden shed to boot !
These properties are sought after and snapped up quickly !
THERE ARE CURRENTLY NO PUBLIC OPEN HOMES SCHEDULED.
Please call the agent to book a private inspection.
